title: The Unseen Sentinel: The Week of Frank Harris

story.text: Frank Harris starts his week typically as a high school physics teacher, unbeknownst to his students that he harbors the power to control kinetic energy. After school, he spends time mentoring at the local community center.

During a routine walk home, Frank notices a car losing control, heading to a crowded bus stop. Swiftly, he dissipates the kinetic energy of the vehicle, bringing it to a safe stop, unseen from the shadows.
Frank spends the evening refining his powers. He has recently discovered he can not only stop motion but can also redistribute kinetic energy, potentially using it to power other objects or heal.
A major gas leak in a nearby building poses a colossal threat. Frank discretely uses his powers to prevent the gas from igniting, saving hundreds of lives without revealing his identity.
Frank is approached by a mysterious woman who knows about his powers. She warns him about a group that seeks to exploit individuals like him for their abilities.
In confrontation with the group, Frank masterfully controls the situation by absorbing their weapons' kinetic energy, rendering them ineffective. He warns them to cease their pursuits.

Reflecting on his actions, Frank realizes the potential his powers hold not only in small deeds but in facing larger threats. He decides to take a proactive role in protecting the city from the shadows.

ending: Thus, Frank Harris became the guardian of his city, always watching, always ready, but never known.
moral: True heroes are not always those who are seen, but those who act with courage and resolve when needed most.
